General.Name: Korea Information Certificate Authority Inc
General.Description: Korea Information Certificate Authority, Inc. provides certification and authentication services worldwide. It offers security solutions, SSL certification, device certificates, digital signatures, electronic documents, and biometric authentication services, as well as public key infrastructure consulting services. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
General.Address: Pangyo Digital Center 242, Seongnam-si, South Korea, 13487
